Name: **RNA_Spot_ID**
Description: A unique identifier for this bright Spot.

Name: **Channel_Name**
Description: The name of the Channel that was used to image this Spot.

Name: **Fluorophore_Name**
Description: The name of the Fluorophore whose Emission is utilized to detect this Spot.
